Never seems to be present in heart, no matter what the provocation.","45":"cannot tell novels from newspaper reports, or gossip from fact.","55":"has forgotten achieving several important inventions; blinks in confusion at the diploma on the wall.","65":"drafts fictional obituaries, one after another.","85":"sends thank you notes for every critical review in the Huffam Post.","75":"has published three conflicting memoirs, each 'correcting' the last."}}
translation: {"enlightenment_crime":{"0":"犯了懒惰之罪。","10":"因为没有培养出任何特长而被带到这里。","5":"喜欢偷懒与谈论刺绣。","25":"习惯性地将海水浴和素食推荐给不喜欢这些东西的友人。","50":"经常和他人说起组装瓶中火车的爱好。","75":"总是向一些自己并不信仰的神明祈祷。","55":"罹患麻木不仁和缺乏情感。","45":"喜欢吃角豆糖。","40":"经常整个下午都在睡觉，并假装是因为头痛才这么做。","60":"在来这里之前，从未做过任何可能引起邻居不满的事。","65":"常常酗酒，但并未从中得到任何乐趣。","80":"因在火车上打鼾而有罪。","90":"在来钟琴区前读过每一期《壁炉与天穹》。","85":"是一个迂腐的守财奴。","30":"生来就有诗歌天赋，却坚决对这项特长视而不见。","35":"如果不是不愿意提笔的话，本应成为一位伟大的小说家。","52":"本应是一位卓有成就的作曲家，却害怕这份职业的薪水不佳。","47":"秘密地收藏了许多红色的拖鞋、袜子和靴子，却从来不敢穿出来。","95":"仅仅是希望在后花园里种出更整齐的花朵。","49":"千里迢迢来到这里，却没有找到任何值得在送往家里的信件中提及的东西，除了寡淡的食物与不变的天气。","63":"拥有足以成为将军的军事谋略天赋，却讨厌号令他人。","43":"差点申请去大学学习密码神学，但在最后一刻放弃了志向，打盹去了。","20":"讨厌体力劳动、脑力劳动、社交活动和任何其他可能引起焦虑的职业。","22":"比起钢笔来说更喜欢使用铅笔，因为这样可以降低出错的风险。","70":"曾经专业跳舞，但从未参加过派对或接待过来到化妆间的崇拜者。","72":"常常习惯性地暴饮暴食。","51":"收藏了一系列古董与现代直刃工具，并出版过相关专著。","48":"收到过一顶华丽的午夜蓝色假发，但却从未戴上过。","53":"从叔叔那里继承了一座奇特的豪宅，但从未参观过那座庄园。","68":"以前对囚徒之蜜上瘾，却不记得其中的任何梦境。","82":"会在歌剧演出时打哈欠一事已经人尽皆知。","78":"会在滑稽表演中睡着。","88":"有一本账本，上面记录着所有给顽童的硬币面值。","57":"在花硬币之前会先抛光它们。","32":"写出过一篇精彩的讽刺作品，但因担心不受欢迎而把它留在了抽屉里。","42":"接受迷人聚会的邀请后，常常在最后一刻不愿意参加。","38":"制作了一本关于保健运动的小册子，并将其交给仆人传阅。","84":"总是坐在剧院的前排，戴着单片眼镜，演出时会在小本子上做笔记。","28":"会在乘坐任何公共交通工具时向其他乘客介绍他们不感兴趣的地标。","15":"曾偏爱甜葡萄酒和角豆糖。"},"ordeal_crime":{"0":"不怜悯任何人。","10":"假装感受到他人的痛苦，但结果仅仅是让他们被安全感麻痹。","20":"既不落泪也不后悔。","30":"没有家人，也不想要。","40":"过于粗暴地拒绝了一位求婚者，以至于他投河自尽。","50":"扼杀任何对爱或吸引的感觉。","60":"在过去的十多年里一直与一个兄弟不和。","70":"躲避婚礼，取笑洗礼。","80":"从不送礼物。","90":"从来没有给过乞丐一分钱。","95":"受到称赞时会阴暗地笑。","98":"对任何善意或奉承都会以傻笑回应。","5":"踢过小狗和孩童。","15":"觉得猫是一种孽障。","25":"只有当一匹好马被送去胶水厂时才会欣赏它的线条。","35":"每当有人在附近接吻，就会大声咳嗽。","45":"在新娘队伍的上方倒夜壶。","55":"离群索居，孤独一人，连对冷血动物也不亲近。","65":"读诗时喜欢把里面的词换成骂人的话。","75":"不接受包裹​​递送，并始终将其标为“退回发件人”。","85":"觉得婚礼蛋糕浪费黄油。","88":"曾把心上人推进河里。","78":"不喜欢挠猫的脑袋，与狗在一起时会戴手套。","68":"把一只宠物蜥蜴送人，来避免对其产生依恋。","58":"觉得小孩的声音很刺耳，还喜欢故意踩他们的玩具。","48":"背叛过配偶。","38":"曾为了钱财而杀害配偶。","28":"出于厌倦而解除过婚约。"},"endurance_crime":{"0":"曾试图救活一位朋友，但失败了。","10":"曾与死亡侨民恋爱。","20":"曾对家庭成员做过尸检。","30":"拒绝食肉或参军。","40":"看起来不会被教堂墓地、废墟或韵诗的力量触动。","50":"冒过很多明显十分愚蠢的风险。","60":"不喜欢参加葬礼。","70":"拒绝为死去的朋友或亲戚哀悼。","80":"曾提前买过一块墓碑，放在空房间里，以备不时之需。","90":"曾把一具尸体在屋里放了四个月。","95":"屡次用廉价物品贿赂死神，有一次送的是一只磷光甲虫。","85":"曾翻新过一个旧的地下室并住了进去。","5":"没有因为其姐妹的去世而哭泣。","15":"在笼子里养过一只宠物鼠，在它死后很久，仍然继续饲养它，给它穿上小衣服，清理它的皮毛。","25":"曾把一只死去的圣灵猿带到了一个舞会上。","99":"曾在超出还书日期后仍保留着图书馆的书。","75":"吞火、玩斧头、睡在未爆炸的炸弹旁边。","45":"曾逼问魔鬼的死因，并拒绝被他们的善意谎言所哄骗。","35":"曾用头骨装饰婚礼餐桌。,"55":"已把自己培养得百毒不侵。","65":"曾在守灵仪式上举行婚礼祝酒仪式。","88":"死过七次。","62":"曾练习过制作动物标本。","32":"曾穿黑衣参加婚礼，理由是这样显瘦。","78":"曾在看到自己姨妈的尸体时开怀大笑。","92":"收到死刑判决后面露喜色。","72":"在燃料与补给都不足时驶入海泽。","52":"曾进入过一所屋子里传言闹鬼的黑暗地下室。","82":"将死亡威胁保存在纪念册中。","68":"曾将亲戚的尸体出售给医生，理由是这么做比葬礼便宜。","58":"曾挖出敌人的股骨，并把它当作槌子。","48":"曾在普伦蒂的嘉年华里吃了三包不明食物，导致自己濒死。","38":"曾率领一支禁忌探险队深入古大陆深处。","28":"曾不戴手套对砷做实验。"},"conversion_crime":{"0":"曾用一种更为大众所知的称谓来称呼领主。","10":"研究过一些不宜为人所知的生物学问题。","90":"曾冒用过一个显赫家族的座右铭和家族纹章。","80":"否认任何非人生物的优越性。","20":"自称是某位恶魔的私生子。","70":"在信件上使用了一个通常保留给非凡存在的尊称。","30":"曾假装是女皇的一个鲜为人知的表弟。","60":"曾在其无权这么做的情况下身着貂皮。","40":"尽管出身极其卑微，但还是使用一辆门上镶有镀金板的马车。","5":"曾邀请一位公主参加酒会。","15":"试图搭皇家马车的便车。","25":"曾把一幅儿童画挂在皇家画廊。","35":"把自己伪装成第四城的幸存者。","95":"在不是该市居民的情况下竞选市长。","50":"在谈话中无节制地使用法语。","85":"不停对他人说起曾与妍倩公主相遇的轶事。"},"deprivation_crime":{"0":"众所周知在白天睡觉。","50":"习惯穿没洗的袜子。","70":"熬夜参加聚会而且在主人睡觉时还赖着不走。","90":"被无法解释的饥饿困扰着。","20":"写打油诗作为消遣并且在说话时总喜欢用双关语。","80":"不记得周年纪念日，不在乎生日，对宗教节日毫无兴趣。","30":"不管和谁在一起都会用多种语言说脏话。","40":"把一双袜子穿到发臭。","10":"有口臭而且喜欢唱水手号子。","60":"会出于好奇心而去吃昆虫和蠕虫。","45":"不管收到了多少礼物怀表，从来都不会带着它们。","65":"喜欢和死亡侨民，贪污犯，以及任何冒用他人面容的人打交道。","75":"曾经养了一窝老鼠作为陪伴和娱乐。","35":"不用手帕和纸巾擦东西，而更喜欢用袖子。","55":"在柜子上放了一个罐子，里面装着腌人手。","25":"从来不会丢掉吃剩下的斯蒂尔顿奶酪，不管放了多久。","15":"养了一只猫但从来不铲屎。","5":"曾经是一个鲁莽的失眠患者。","85":"从来没有过能看点或计时的东西。","82":"账单逾期两个月后才交钱。","95":"会吃加了糖的火蚁。","12":"懒得洗澡。","3":"吃标新立异的早餐。","68":知道表亲犯了罪，但是没有举报。","72":"在聚会开始前四十五分钟就到了，那时准备工作还没完成。","62":"认为晚饭吃老虎肉也是可以接受的。","18":"小时候在泰晤士河里游泳。"},"excess_crime":{"0":"研究熄灭星星的方法。","10":"支持黑夜解放。","20":"曾将经过审查的歌剧乐谱递交给本瑟的学生。","25":"曾在码头发过违禁小册子。","30":"曾破译过七个信符中本不该被理解的符印。","40":"曾偷看领主洗澡。","50":"捕获过一只海蝙蝠，将其解剖后，用最优质的黄铜将其重塑。","60":"小时候曾偷偷藏在一只航向汗国的邮政蒸汽船上。","70":"曾携提灯进入位于地面最低点的黑暗区域。","80":"曾拜访过陌生人的梦境，并从里面获取了一些纪念品。","90":"尽管有教会的警告，但仍然研究巴比伦的数字预言。","95":"曾偷过公德部中待审查的书籍。","85":"写过一本关于游荡之山习性的专著。","75":"曾研究过捕获的月光对幼儿的影响。","55":"曾在未经允许或邀请的情况下探索皇宫的地下室。","65":"曾询问过橡胶疙瘩的配方。","5":"曾从死信办公室里偷走别人的邮件。","15":"曾正确地预测了普鲁士的权力更迭。","35":"知道怎么根据咖啡渣的图案算命。","45":"对井里的东西有着病态的兴趣。","3":"收集过许多粘土人的人生故事。","8":"曾誊抄过用古代语言写就的墓志铭。","12":"饲养过一群蜘蛛用作研究，并一直地给它们喂食眼球。","18":"曾研究过“曾犯不恕叛行者不在其场，而曾携难喻魅力者失其魅力”的符印。","32":"购买过一对经过防腐处理的螃蟹，经检查发现是违禁动物。","22":"曾公开朗读敌手的日记。","28":"曾怀疑某位熟人领取高于其应得的工资而监视他。","38":"曾窃取海军部的秘密档案。","42":"曾焚烧邻居的邮包，以防其中装有烟花。","48":"曾潜入殡仪馆中偷看死者。"},"inescapable_truth_crime":{"0":"曾冒用别人的名字，却忘了那是笔名。","10":"不停撒谎，但毫不自知。","20":"忘了双亲的名字。","30":"曾分享过世纪之蕈的孢子。","40":"过去经常照几个小时的镜子，觉得里面的人不是自己。","50":"曾对朋友的才能撒谎。","60":"总是发脾气，之后又总声称自己不是故意的。","70":"受到攻击时不愿反击。","80":"认不出倒影，还觉得镜子令人困惑。","90":"曾拜访过镜子后面的世界，在回来后发生了巨大的变化。","5":"忘记了童年和青年时期的许多事。","15":"创作过一部杰出的小说，却忘记阅读读者的评论。","25":"习惯性地赞美敌手，并为那些最不值得的人提供帮助。","35":"感觉愤怒就像舌尖酸涩，悲伤就像肘部发痒，侮辱就像大蒜臭味。无论受到怎样的挑衅，心里似乎都从不在意。","45":"无法区分小说和报纸报道，或者传言和事实。","55":"忘记了自己的几项重要的发明，并看着自家墙上的文凭困惑地眨眼。","65":"起草了一份又一份虚构的讣告。","85":"曾给《赫芬顿邮报》中的每一条批判性评论发送过感谢信。","75":"出版过三本相互矛盾的回忆录，每本都对前一本进行了“修正”。"}}

original: Charred Empyrean Nameplate
translation: 烧焦的苍天上国铭牌

original: You have fought and bested a vessel of the Empyrean. There is one at Winter's Reside who collects these.
translation: 你已经与一台苍天上国的机车战斗并击败了他，在冬日之居有一个收集它们的人。

original: Charred Stovepipe Nameplate
translation: 烧焦的高帽党铭牌

original: Acquired from the wreckage of a slaughtered dreadnought. Its name has been contorted by heat.
translation: 从被击败的无畏机车的残骸中获得，它的名字已经被高温扭曲。

original: Cheer
translation: 欢呼

original: Be of good heart.
translation: 鼓舞士气

original: Cheerfulness in Titania
translation: 狄坦妮娅的欢呼声

original: How are the artists getting along?
translation: 艺术家们相处得如何？

original: {"MAYORHOPE":{"10":"The Rhapsodic Mayor smiles fixedly at the designs. \"Hideous cost, but tremendous opportunity. If one building falls, we may erect a new one. It all works out in the end.\"","13":"The Rhapsodic Mayor smiles widely, and sings to herself several variations of the same tune: \"Build it up with wood and clay… Wood and clay the stingers splinter. Build it up with iron and steel… Iron and steel they'll stab right through. No. No, no, no.\"  ","15":"The Rhapsodic Mayor sits silently, her hands folded neatly on her desk. She stares at a corkboard behind you. Appended are the names of the dead, and the ongoing costs of reconstruction. Her warpaint, never taken off, has begun to cake and crack; like a clown who has performed for too many days in a row without break.","0":"","5":"\"We've submissions from every artistic school,\" the Rhapsodic Mayor proudly notes. \"The Celestials, the Nocturnals, the Sovereigns; nothing would delight my heart more than to build them all. But we've not the foundations laid to support every project; nor, frankly, the money. \n\n\"If I'm to assign public funds to one, the others will throw a fit, and the next thing you know it'll be civil war! But that's where you come in: if you provide external funding to a project, I may authorise it and see that it's built in peace.\""},"BloomBowerHealth":{"5":"The Titanians are hard at work. From open doors, you can hear the crash of metal against stone as they chisel statuary; you can hear snippets of song, as they try new arrangements of lyrics.","12":"The Titanians are not in the streets. You only see a few faces peeking through their windows, fearfully scanning the skies.","0":"","10":"The Titanians shuffle wide-eyed through their streets. They look like failing actors in a production going desperately wrong, badly pretending that all is well as the sets are falling down behind them.","14":"The Titanians shuffle sombrely between their boarded homes. All is silent. Occasionally, one raises their head, listening for something far away."},"PosyParkHealth":{"5":"If the pleasure can be imagined, it can be experienced in Posy Park. The Titanians are an imaginative lot - the lengths they go through for art and sensorial delights is not to be underestimated. ","10":"There are Titanians who, after the Tragedy, delve more deeply into the pleasures of Posy Park than ever. They are frantic, desperate to forget.","12":"The pleasures of Posy Park are not quite what they were. The delights are more innocent, more sentimental. The nights are quieter, too.","14":"The pleasure district is not as frequented as it once was. The Titanians cannot afford the distractions; but the artistic still practice here, demonstrating their talents through their war paints.","0":""},"PetalFallHealth":{"5":"On clear days, the Titanians gather here to watch the horizon. Verdant infinity reaches out beyond them.","10":"Titanians patrol the horizon in turns, horns at their sides. They carry notebooks, and stop often to write a snatch of poetry, or work on a sketch.","12":"Watchtowers have been erected. The Titanians watch the horizon with telescopes, always.","14":"The Titanians do not come here often. Their sirens are warning enough.","0":""},"PosyParkTour":{"5":"It shall depend on whichever you favour.\"","10":"We've also been working on plans for an academy of war.\" She looks wistfully at the sky.","0":""},"PetalFallTour":{"0":"","10":"But it may be more practical to build a fortress. We have a committee design.\"","5":"I'm excited for whatever it will be!\""}}
translation: {"MAYORHOPE": {"10": "热情洋溢的市长面带僵硬的微笑注视着设计图。\"造价骇人，但机遇惊人。若一栋建筑倒下，我们便可新建一栋。终归是收支相抵。\"","13": "热情洋溢的市长笑得更灿烂了，哼唱着同一曲调的不同变奏：\"用木料和黏土建造...木料黏土终将崩裂。用钢铁铸造...钢铁之躯亦被刺穿。不。不，不，不。\"","15": "热情洋溢的市长静默端坐，双手整齐交叠于案前。她凝视着你身后的软木板，上面钉着遇难者名单与重建持续支出的账单。她从未卸下的战妆已开始板结龟裂，如同连续表演多日不得歇息的小丑。","0": "","5": "\"我们收到了各艺术学派的提案，\"热情洋溢的市长自豪地指出，\"天体派、夜行派、皇政派；若能悉数建造实乃我毕生所愿。但我们的地基难以承载所有工程，更坦白说——资金也不允许。\n\n\"若我动用公款资助某一学派，其他学派定会大闹议会，转眼间城邦就要陷入内战！这正是你发挥作用之时：若你能为某项目提供外部资金，我便可正式批准，确保工程和平推进。\""},"BloomBowerHealth": {"5": "狄坦妮娅人正辛勤劳作。敞开的门扉后传来金属凿击石材的铿锵声，他们在雕刻塑像；飘来零星的歌声，他们在尝试新的词曲编排。","12": "狄坦妮娅人闭门不出。只见零星几人从窗缝窥视，惶恐地扫视天际。","0": "","10": "狄坦妮娅人瞪大双眼在街道上踟躇而行。他们如同在灾难性崩坏的戏剧中强撑表演的蹩脚演员，布景在身后倾塌，却仍拙劣地佯装一切安好。","14": "狄坦妮娅人神情肃穆地在封板的屋舍间穿行。万籁俱寂。偶有人抬头侧耳，似在聆听远方声响。"},"PosyParkHealth": {"5": "凡可想象的欢愉，皆可在锦簇公园体验。狄坦妮娅人极富想象力——他们为艺术与感官享受所付出的努力不容小觑。","10": "部分狄坦妮娅人在悲剧发生后，比以往更深地沉溺于锦簇公园的欢愉。他们陷入癫狂，迫切想要忘却。","12": "锦簇公园的欢愉已不复往昔。娱乐项目变得更纯真，更感性。夜晚也更静谧了。","14": "娱乐区人流稀疏。狄坦妮娅人已无力消遣；但艺者们仍在此练习，通过战妆展示才华。","0": ""},"PetalFallHealth": {"5": "晴日里，狄坦妮娅人在此聚集眺望地平线。翠树之海向着无垠远方延展。","10": "狄坦妮娅人轮班巡视地平线，腰间别着号角。他们带着笔记本，时常驻足书写诗句或绘制草图。","12": "瞭望塔已拔地而起。狄坦妮娅人始终通过望远镜监视地平线。","14": "狄坦妮娅人鲜少来此。警报声已是足够的警示。","0": ""},"PosyParkTour": {"5": "\"这将取决于您的偏好。\"","10": "\"我们也在筹备战争学院的方案。\"她怅然望向天际。","0": ""},"PetalFallTour": {"0": "","10": "\"但建造堡垒或许更为实际。我们已有委员会的设计方案。\"","5": "\"无论建成何等模样都令人期待！\""}}

original: Chief Engineer
translation: 轮机长

original: Chiropterous Hoarder
translation: 蝙蝠囤积狂

original: Swaddled in vermillion, it is a lean and spindly horror with the most velvety of ears.
translation: 身披深红，它是一个瘦削且纤细的恐怖生物，拥有最柔软的耳朵。

original: {"1":"The Chiropterous Hoarder has joined your crew as an officer.","0":"The Chiropterous Hoarder is transformed."}
translation: {"1":"蝙蝠囤积狂作为车务官加入了你的列车员中。","0":"蝙蝠囤积狂被转变了。"}

original: Choir Practice
translation: 合唱团练习

original: You are practicing your singing, in imitation of the Clay Choirs.
translation: 你正在练习唱歌，模仿粘土合唱团的样子。

original: {"1":"Your singing is horrible.","2":"You are slightly improved.","3":"You think you might be getting somewhere."}
translation: {"1":"你的歌声太可怕了。","2":"你略有进步。","3":"你觉得你可能取得了一些成果。"}

original: Chorister Bee Trophy
translation: 唱诗蜂的战利品

original: Ready for mounting at the New Somerset Hunting Club.
translation: 已准备好安装在新萨默塞特狩猎俱乐部中。

original: {"1":"You have collected a trophy."}
translation: {"1":"你已经取得了一个战利品。"}

original: Chunk of Blue Amber
translation: 大块蓝琥珀

original: A fist-sized chunk of Rubbery secretions, the colour of nostalgia and regret.
translation: 一块拳头大小的橡胶状分泌物，是怀旧和遗憾的颜色。

original: Chunk of Golden Amber
translation: 大块金琥珀

original: A fist-sized chunk of Rubbery secretions, shining the colour of hope.
translation: 一块拳头大小的橡胶性分泌物，闪耀着希望的颜色。

original: Chunk of Green Amber
translation: 大块绿琥珀

original: A fist-sized chunk of Rubbery secretions the colour of home and loss.
translation: 一块拳头大小的橡胶性分泌物，闪耀着家和失落的颜色。

original: Chunk of Red Amber
translation: 大块红琥珀

original: A fist-sized chunk of Rubbery secretions, the colour of life and pain.
translation: 一块拳头大小的橡胶性分泌物，是生命和痛苦的颜色。

original: Chunk of Soft Amber
translation: 大块软琥珀

original: A fist-sized lump of Rubbery secretions with the colour, texture and commercial worth of earwax.
translation: 一块拳头大小的橡胶性分泌物，具有耳垢的颜色、质地和商业价值。

original: Cinders Tracker
translation: 煤渣追踪者

original: Circus Backstage Pass
translation: 马戏团后台通行证

original: You have helped out the Ringmaster.
translation: 你已经帮助了马戏团团长。

original: Circus Pass
translation: 马戏团通行证

original: You have earned free tickets to the Circus.
translation: 你已经获得马戏团的免费门票。

original: {"1":"You can now get free tickets to the Circus."}
translation: {"1":""你现在可以获得马戏团的免费门票。."}

original: Clay Conductor
translation: 粘土人列车主管

original: An experienced First Officer, the Clay Conductor is invaluable in a locomotive emergency: calm, ruthlessly strong, and largely impervious to fire.
translation: 作为一名经验丰富的大副，粘土人列车主管在机车紧急情况下表现得极具价值：镇定沉着、坚决果断且对火焰基本免疫。

original: {"1":"You have recruited the Clay Conductor.","0":"The Clay Conductor is no longer aboard your engine."}
translation: {"1":"你已经招聘了一位粘土人列车主管。","0":"粘土人列车主管不再是你机车上的一员。"}

original: Clay Conductor & Copper Companion
translation: 粘土人列车主管与铜伴

original: Clay Conductor and Copper Companion
translation: 粘土人列车主管与他的铜伴

original: They come as a pair. Together, they make a much improved First Officer.
translation: 他们总是成双作伴。在一起时，他们算是一名非常优秀的大副。

original: {"1":"The Clay Conductor and the Copper Companion are permanent additions to your crew."}
translation: {"1":"粘土人列车主管与铜伴会一直作为你列车员的一份子。"}

original: Clear
translation: 澄明

original: "Soul is fully transparent. No swirls, no clouding, no personality." The Presiding Deviless, the Carillon Compendium.
translation: “灵魂呈完全透明质地。不产生漩涡，不出现浑浊，不包含个性。”——女魔鬼主管，《钟琴区汇编》。

original: {"1":"The devils of Carillon claim to be experts in the assessment and improvement of the soul. They would describe yours as disappointingly clear; almost transparent.","0":"The devils of Carillon claim to be experts in the assessment and improvement of the soul. They would describe yours as tantalisingly opaque, and rich with personality."}
translation: {"1":"钟琴区的魔鬼们自称是评估和改善灵魂的专家。他们认为你的灵魂澄清得让他们失望，它过于透明了。","0":"钟琴区的魔鬼们自称是评估和改善灵魂的专家。他们认为你的灵魂浑浊诱人，且富有个性。"}

original: Climb Lustrum Timer
translation: 攀爬伍载镇计时器

original: Cold
translation: 冰寒

original: "The soul is icy to the touch. Dispassionate, clinical, removed." The Presiding Deviless, the Carillon Compendium.
translation: “灵魂触感冰冷。呈冷漠，客观，疏离性格。”——女魔鬼主管，《钟琴区汇编》。

original: {"0":"The devils of Carillon claim to be experts in the assessment and improvement of the soul. They would describe yours as tantalisingly opaque, and rich with personality.","1":"The devils of Carillon claim to be experts in the assessment and improvement of the soul. They would describe yours as still, pale and chilly to the palate.."}
translation: {"0":"钟琴区的魔鬼们自称是评估和改善灵魂的专家。他们认为你的灵魂浑浊诱人，且富有个性。","1":"钟琴区的恶魔们自称是评估和改善灵魂的专家。他们认为你灵魂的口感平淡，苍白而冰冷……"}

original: Commingling of Choirs
translation: 混合合唱团

original: We tilted our vanes and ennobled our spires. They welcomed us then and commingled all choirs.
translation: 我们倾斜了我们的叶片，增强了我们的塔尖。他们欢迎我们，并将所有唱诗班混合在一起。

original: {"25":"You Commingled your Choirs!"}
translation: {"25":"你混合了你的合唱团！"}

original: Commissioning the Astral Ampitheatre
translation: 委托建造星空环形剧场

original: A new epic poem will soon have its debut.
translation: 一首新的史诗很快将首次亮相。

original: Commissioning the Cosmogonic Observatory
translation: 委托建造宇宙观象台

original: The astronomers are collating their stories. They'll have a volume for you soon.
translation: 天文学家们正在整理他们的故事。他们很快就会有一卷给你。

original: Commissioning the Empress' Head
translation: 委托建造皇后头酒馆

original: The pub landlord shall soon finish preparations for a contest.
translation: 酒馆老板将很快完成比赛的准备工作。

original: Commissioning the Imperial Cathedral
translation: 委托建造帝国大教堂

original: The Bishop and all the brothers and sisters of the Cathedral are working on a blessing for you.
translation: 主教和大教堂的所有兄弟姐妹们正在为你准备祝福。

original: Commissioning the Light Opera House
translation: 委托建造轻歌剧院

original: A new production is underway. The curtain shall soon rise!
translation: 一部新的作品正在进行中。帷幕将很快拉开!

original: Commissioning the Palace of Sighs
translation: 委托建造叹息宫

original: You'll soon find something special in those labyrinthine halls.
translation: 你很快就会在那些迷宫般的大厅里发现特别的东西。

original: Complete Set of Cantankeri Anatomical Diagrams
translation: 成套的顽固虱解剖图

original: It is very detailed indeed.
translation: 确实非常详细。

original: Completed a Horologist Assignment
translation: 完成了一个钟表师的任务

original: Time keeps slipping.
translation: 时间在不断地流逝。

original: {"0":"A new assignment waits for you in London."}
translation: {"0":"一项新的任务在伦敦等着你。"}

original: Completed Amenable Host Quest
translation: 完成了随和的主管的任务

original: Completed FIlmmaker Quest
translation: 完成电影制作人任务

original: Completed Magdalene's Quest
translation: 完成了抹大拉之家的任务

original: Hidden quality to lock the Amenable Host questline in Magdalene's once completed.
translation: 完成抹大拉之家中的随和主管任务线后，会锁定隐藏的质量。

original: Completed the Murgatroyd Run
translation: 完成穆加托德之行

original: Completed the Sequencer's Assignments
translation: 完成了新秩序者的任务

original: Completed Tours of Piranesi
translation: 完成了皮拉内西之行

original: The Chaplains of Piranesi have assured you they'd like to see you again, though perhaps not for a little while.
translation: 皮拉内西的牧师们向你保证，他们希望再次见到你，尽管可能要等上一段时间。

original: {"1":"You have completed a tour of Piranesi! The Chaplains will only allow two tours at a time before they temporarily close the prison to visitors.","2":"You have completed your second tour of Piranesi! "}
translation: {"1":"你已经完成了皮拉内西之行！"。牧师们每次只允许参观两次，然后他们会暂时关闭监狱，不允许访客进入。","2":"你已经完成了对皮拉内西的第二次参观！"}

original: Concealed Cavities
translation: 隐藏空腔

original: Hidden spaces in the hull, which the Revenue Men might overlook.
translation: 车体中的隐藏空间，税务官可能会忽略掉它。

original: Condemned Experiment
translation: 违背伦理的实验品

original:
The process was unconscionable, but results are results.
(Acquire these at Worlebury-Juxta-Mare, in Albion.)
translation:
实验过程虽违反道德，但是能得到结果就行。
（从阿尔比恩的滨海沃伯瑞处获得。）

original: Conducted a Scintillant Experiment
translation: 进行了一场闪烁者的实验

original: While visiting the wreck of the Berrenger, you've conducted some research into the place-behind-glass.
translation: 在拜访贝伦格号的残骸时，你对玻璃后面的地方进行了一些研究。

original: Conspiring with the Cult
translation: 与邪教密谋

original: You have met the cult in the Off Season. Perhaps you sympathise with their cause.
translation: 你在淡季遇到了邪教。或许你同情他们的事业。

original: {"10":"The cult has another task for you.","11":"Take leaflets to the Avid Horizon.","20":"The cult has one more task for you.","1":"The cult seeks new blood from Worlebury-juxta-Mare.","5":"Return to the church in the Off Season for your reward.","15":"Return to the cult in the Off Season to report your success.","99":"You've done as the Parson, as the Scorn Fluke wished. Somehow this will help the cult prosper.","25":"Commune with the Fluke in the mists."}
translation: {"10":"邪教还有另一项任务交给你。","11":"将传单带往渴求之地平线。","20":"邪教还有另一项任务交给你。","1":"邪教正从滨海沃伯瑞寻找新信众。","5":"在淡季返回教堂领取你的报酬。","15":"在淡季返回邪教，汇报你的成果。","99":"你已如牧师所愿，如藐视锚虫所愿地完成了任务。这将以某种方式协助邪教繁荣昌盛。","25":"在迷雾中与锚虫共鸣。"}

original:
{"Result":{"20":""They are dreaming of you. They Who Must Grieve whisper to me in my sleep of your face, the lines of your throat and nose. They tell me things of you that I do not understand." The Bedraggled Parson's regard burns like sepsis, abyss-deep and incurious.","10":""We ignore our dreams too easily," says the Bedraggled Parson, eyes abstract, fixed on a sky obscured by sinew. "We pretend that they are nothing but the brain misfiring, that they are memories poorly assembled. But they are more. They are how the gods speak to us. And They Who Must Grieve, they've sent me signs." 

He is not talking with you, but at you. Does he care that he's near-incomprehensible? His followers nod, entranced. They understand, or do not care that they don't.","11":""We understand that it can feel demeaning." When he speaks, it is with the resonance of a choir, symphonic and strange. "To do such... menial things. But they are necessary. As breathing is necessary, as light, as air."

He seems to be acknowledging the tasks he asks of you. This is almost certainly no indication that he intends to remunerate you suitably.","15":""Strangers, sour-faced, sour-mouthed, have begun to fill the Off Season. Is this your doing? If so, thank you." The Bedraggled Parson slants a heavy-lashed stare. 

That certainly sounds like the Displeased you encountered in the Avid Horizon. What ship brought them here so swiftly?","25":""Do not keep them waiting." The Bedraggled Parson sways his head to a music only he can hear, a mourner in the throes of a dirge. "You must descend to them."

His encouragement is gentle, but consistent. He knows you will go into the mists eventually. It's just a matter of time.","1":""Some of them may resist, but it is only because they are afraid. Change is not intrinsic to human nature." The Bedraggled Parson bobs his head, mouth pinched to a gash. Surely he'd only desire new parishioners who want to be there?","5":""I hear them in my sleep, in the Mists, in the murmur of the On Season as they laugh, glass in their throats. They are crying out for change, for the world to shift. Tell me you've found them." The Bedraggled Parson warbles. "Tell me you've shown them a way home." 

It seems his concern for potential new parishioners goes further than merely increasing the number of his followers.","100":""Aaaah." There is a new light to his fever-burnished stare, a hunger, deep as the throat of the sea. "We are rejuvenated. When I sleep, there is another edge to their songs, something better than before."

You could not have cheered the Scorn Fluke. Could not have saved it. But it got something of value from you, and the parson knows this.","0":""They were kind to you," the Bedraggled Parson says, abruptly and without vitriol, only a pale wonder, eyes fever-warm under the wilds of his hair. It is all he extends. 

Was he talking about the officials from the Bureau of Entertainments? Or someone else?"},"Aftermath":{"0":" ","99":"Something has changed. Something in the gasping air, the texture of light, the smell of Worlebury-juxta-Mare. Perhaps, it is the diminished presence of the Bureau officials, how their swagger has tautened to fear. Perhaps, it is the number of tourists with glass in their eyes, their smiles like they'd caught a fever-bright."},"Mists":{"0":"Mists","25":"The Parson leads you away from the corpse-church and towards the edge of the beach. The mist reaches for your ankles.","30":"This is not terrifying at all. Not the thin leather filaments holding your body. Not the jerky descent into the fog, the cottony silence.

But at least the cheerful cultists at the shore seem optimistic about your chances."}}
translation:
{"Result":{"20":""它在梦中窥见你容颜。执哀者于吾梦中低语，细述你喉颈与鼻梁的轮廓，言说那些我无法参透的奥秘。"衣衫褴褛的牧师投来败血症般燃烧的目光，深渊般深邃却毫无探究之意。","10":""世人太轻易忽视梦境。"衣衫褴褛的牧师说着，目光游离于筋肉遮蔽的天穹，"总说不过是神经突触的误触，是记忆碎片的拙劣拼凑。但不止于此——此乃神谕之道。执哀者……已向我降下征兆。"

与其说是交谈，不如说是宣讲。他知道自己的话近乎呓语吗？追随者们痴迷颔首，或是真能领会，或是根本不在乎是否听懂。","11":""我们明白这像是一种折辱。"他开口时带着唱诗班的和声般共鸣，诡谲如交响，"要你做这些……卑贱之事。但皆为必要。如同呼吸，如同光，如同空气。"

这番说辞似是承认让你做的苦差。但绝不意味着他打算给予相称的报酬。","15":""面容酸苦、言语尖刻的陌生人开始充斥淡季。是你的手笔？若是，便谢过了。"衣衫褴褛的牧师垂睫斜睨。

这描述像极了你在渴求之地平线遭遇的不悦离人。是哪里的快车将他们送来的？","25":""莫让他们久候。"衣衫褴褛的牧师随唯有他能闻的哀乐摆首，恍若挽歌中的悼念者，"你须沉入雾霭寻他们去。"

劝诱温和却执拗。他知你终将踏入迷雾，无非时间问题。","1":""或有抗拒者，不过惧意使然。变革本非人性所向。"衣衫褴褛的牧师频频颔首，嘴唇抿成刀疤。难道他只想要自愿前来的新信徒？","5":""我在睡梦、在雾霭、在旺季人群含玻璃笑语的私语中听见他们。他们渴求变革，渴求世界倾覆。告诉我你已寻得。"牧师颤音道，"告诉我你已指其归途。"

他对潜在信徒的关切，似乎远超出扩充信众的意图。","100":""啊啊。"他高烧般的凝视焕发新光，翻涌着海渊喉底般的饥渴，"吾等重获新生。当我入眠，他们的歌声里多了锋刃，比往昔更胜一筹。"

你不可能取悦藐视锚虫，更遑论拯救。但它从你身上攫取了某种价值——牧师心知肚明。","0":""他们待你仁慈。"衣衫褴褛的牧师突然说道，不带讥讽，唯有苍白的惊异，乱发下双眼发烫。仅此一句。

是指娱乐局的官员？还是另有所指？"},"Aftermath":{"0":" ","99":"某些事物已然变异。在窒息的空气里，在光的肌理中，在滨海沃伯瑞的气味深处。或许是娱乐局官员们瑟缩的威仪，将跋扈换作惊惶。又或是游客们玻璃镶嵌的瞳孔，挂着高烧般刺眼的笑容。"},"Mists":{"0":"雾霭","25":"牧师引你离开停尸教堂，走向海滩边际。雾气缠绕脚踝。","30":"这不可怖。绑缚身躯的皮质细丝不可怖，跌入浓雾的颠簸不可怖，棉絮般的死寂更不可怖。

至少岸边欢欣的教众们，对你生还满怀乐观。"}}

original: Constituents Waiting
translation: 选民在等待

original: Gather the Will of the People to make new laws.
translation: 收集民意，并制定新法律

original: {"0":"New opportunities for laws are available around Albion and the Reach.","2":"Delegations are waiting in Carillon, Lustrum, The Most Serene Mausoleum and Worlebury.","1":"Delegations are waiting in London, Port Prosper, Brabazon and Perdurance.","3":"Delegations are waiting in Magdalene's, New Winchester and Port Avon."}
translation: {"0":"在阿尔比恩及外野全域颁布新法的机会出现了。","2":"代表团静候于钟琴区、伍载镇、圣宁墓与滨海沃伯瑞。","1":"代表团静候于伦敦、兴荣港、布拉巴宗及琥珀宫。","3":"代表团静候于抹大拉之家、新温彻斯特与埃文港。"}

original: {"0":"You have spoken with your constituents."}
translation: {"0":""你已经和你的选民谈过了。"}

original: Consultation Done
translation: 咨询完成

original: Contentable Cabins
translation: 舒适的车厢

original: A bunk for every crewman and a crewman in every bunk! And concealed beneath those bunks, hidden compartments and secret spaces where an enterprising captain could hide their contraband.
translation: 每个列车员都有一个铺位，每个铺位都有一名列车员！并隐藏在那些铺位、隐藏隔间和秘密空间下，有进取心的车长可以在那里藏匿他们的违禁品。

original: Contraband: Albion
translation: 违禁品：阿尔比恩

original: It's not illegal unless you get caught with it.
translation: 只要你不被抓到，就不算犯法。

original: Contriver's Collaborator
translation: 发明家的合作者

original: A petite devil, assisting the Diabolical Contriver with the invention of an experimental engine.
translation: 一个娇小的魔鬼，协助恶魔发明家创造了一种实验引擎。

original: {"1":"The Contriver's Collaborator has joined your crew.","0":"The Contriver's Collaborator has taken her leave."}
translation: {"1":"发明家的合作者已加入你的列车员。","0":"发明家的合作者已离开。"}

original: Conversation: The Fastidious Inspector
translation: 对话：一丝不苟的检察官

original: Conversing with the Genial Auditor
translation: 与亲切的审查员交谈

original: Conversing with the Overseers
translation: 与监督员交谈

original: Corpse Timer
translation: 尸体计时器

original: Correspondence from the Assiduous Semiotician
translation: 来自刻苦符号学家的信符

original:
A timer quality used to determine when the Semiotician's letters reach you in the Port Avon's Rubbings quest (see here: http://algernonbaroque.storynexus.com/Qualitying/Edit?qualityId=133557)

Letters arrive for you at London and New Winchester after 15 minutes of playtime.
translation:
一个计时器属性，用于判断在“埃文港拓印任务”中，符号学家的信件何时会寄达你手中（参见：http://algernonbaroque.storynexus.com/Qualitying/Edit?qualityId=133557）。

信件将在你游玩十五分钟后寄达伦敦与新温彻斯特。

original: Correspondence Sigil at Traitor's Wood
translation: 叛徒之林的信符符印

original: The Inscribed Tinkerer wants you to investigate a particular sign of the Correspondence.
translation: 铭文工匠想让你调查一个信符的特殊标志。

original: {"1":"The Sigil might be found in Traitor's Wood.","10":"You found the sigil in Traitor's Wood."}
translation: {"1":"符印可能会在叛徒之林找到。"，"10":"你在叛徒之林找到了符印。"}

original: Correspondence Sigil in Pan
translation: 潘城的信符符印

original: The Inscribed Tinkerer wants you to investigate a particular sign of the Correspondence.
translation: 铭文工匠想让你调查一个信符的特殊标志。

original: {"1":"The Sigil might be found in Pan.","10":"You found the sigil in Pan."}
translation: {"1":"符印可能会在潘城找到。"，"10":"你在潘城找到了符印。"}

original: Correspondence Sigil in the Most Serene Mausoleum
translation: 圣宁墓的信符符印

original: The Inscribed Tinkerer wants you to investigate a particular sign of the Correspondence.
translation: 铭文工匠想让你调查一个信符的特殊标志。

original: {"1":"The Sigil might be found in the Most Serene Mausoleum.","10":"You found the sigil in the Most Serene Mausoleum."}
translation: {"1":"符印可能会在圣宁墓找到。"，"10":"你在圣宁墓找到了符印。"}

original: Corruption at the Court
translation: 法院的腐败

original: The Exacting Ombudsman has suspicions about the integrity of the Stone-Faced Court, and has recruited you to help him in his investigation.
translation: 严苛的监察员怀疑石面法庭的公正，并招募了你来帮助他进行调查。

original: {"1":"The Ombudsman has asked to meet you in secret at a coffee-house in Urd.","3":"Attend the Chorea Machabaeorum and find the truth about the Watcher from the Jewelled Judge.","2":"The Ombudsman wants you to acquire an invitation to the Chorea Machabaeorum.","4":"Either find the truth about the Watcher, or confess to the Judge about the Ombudsman's investigation.","5":"Tell the Ombudsman the truth about the Watcher, or lie to him and end his investigation now.","10":"Meet the Ombudsman at the Forge of Souls.","7":"Meet the Ombudsman at Wellmouth.","6":"Tell the Judge that you have ended the Ombudsman's prying.","11":"Lure the Ombudsman to his death, or warn him that he is in danger.","13":"Return to the Lamentation at the Forge of Souls, and tell her that the Ombudsman has been dealt with.","14":"The Ombudsman's investigation is over.","12":"Meet the Ombudsman at Wellmouth.","15":"Tell the Judge that you have ended the Ombudsman's prying."}
translation: {"1":"监察员要求在昔日城的一家咖啡馆秘密会见你。","3":"参加死亡之舞，从珠玉法官那里找到关于守望者的真相。","2":"监察员想让你去拿到一张死亡之舞的邀请函。","4":"要么找出关于守望者的真相，要么向法官坦白监察员的调查。","5":"告诉监察员关于守望者的真相，或者对他撒谎并立即结束他的调查。","10":"去灵魂铸炉见监察员。","7":"去井口见监察员。","6":"告诉法官你已经结束了监察员的探查。","11":"引诱监察员去死，或者警告他有危险。","13":"回到灵魂铸炉的哀歌，告诉她监察员已经被解决了。","14":"监察员的调查结束了。","12":"去井口见监察员。","15":"告诉法官你已经结束了监察员的探查。"}

original: {"1":"The Ombudsman has asked to meet you in secret at a coffee-house in Urd.","2":"The Ombudsman wants you to acquire an invitation to the Chorea Machabaeorum.","10":"Meet the Ombudsman at the Forge of Souls.","7":"Meet the Ombudsman at Wellmouth.","6":"Tell the Judge that you have ended the Ombudsman's prying.","4":"Either find the truth about the Watcher, or confess to the Judge about the Ombudsman's investigation.","5":"Tell the Ombudsman the truth about the Watcher, or lie to him and end his investigation now.","3":"Attend the Chorea Machabaeorum and find the truth about the Watcher from the Jewelled Judge.","11":"Lure the Ombudsman to his death, or warn him that he is in danger.","13":"Return to the Lamentation at the Forge of Souls, and tell her that the Ombudsman has been dealt with.","14":"The Ombudsman's investigation is over.","12":"Meet the Ombudsman at Wellmouth."}
translation: {"1":"监察员要求在昔日城的一家咖啡馆秘密会见你。","2":"监察员想让你去拿到一张死亡之舞的邀请函。","10":"去灵魂铸炉见监察员。","7":"去井口见监察员。","6":"告诉法官你已经结束了监察员的探查。","4":"要么找出关于守望者的真相，要么向法官坦白监察员的调查。","5":"告诉监察员关于守望者的真相，或者对他撒谎并立即结束他的调查。","3":"参加死亡之舞，从珠宝法官那里找到关于守望者的真相。","11":"引诱监察员去死，或者警告他有危险","13":"回到灵魂铸炉的哀歌，告诉她监察员已经被解决了。","14":"监察员的调查结束了。","12":"去井口见监察员。"}

original: {"dance_desc":{"0":"","1":"","2":"","3":"The Jewelled Judge is nowhere to be seen.","4":"The Jewelled Judge is sitting in a private, smoke-filled booth, sipping a cocktail that seems to flash a dozen colours at once."}}
translation: {"dance_desc":{"0":"","1":"","2":"","3":"哪都找不到珠玉法官。","4":"珠玉法官正坐在一个烟雾缭绕的私人包间里，喝着似乎能同时闪现一打颜色的鸡尾酒。"}}

original: Costumes Purchased for Geese!
translation: 为鹅购买的服装！

original: {"0":"They can be restored"}
translation: {"0":"帮他们一个忙"}

original: {"Improvement":{"1":"The Pensive Clown is heralded by his comedic geese, Cuddles and Ruffles, who march in their finery before him. They honk as he juggles them, and the audience collapses into laughter.","0":"Afterward, the Pensive Clown trips into the spotlight, dropping the balls he juggles. It's silent enough to hear them hit the floor. "}}
translation: {"Improvement":{"1":"忧郁的小丑陪着他的两只喜剧鹅，抱抱和荷叶边。它们在他面前穿戴整齐地昂首阔步。在他逗弄它们时，它们都嘎嘎叫起来，观众们都笑倒了。","0":"之后，忧郁的小丑走到聚光灯下，扔下他变戏法的球。棚子里寂静得可以听到它们落地的声音。"}}

original: Cosy Cabins
translation: 舒适的车厢

original: With extra fold-down bunks and some careful shift-scheduling, you can squeeze a few more in. It will be snug, but that keeps the cold at bay.
translation: 有了额外的折叠式铺位和一些精心的轮班安排，你可以多挤几个人进去。它安全且舒适，更重要的是能抵御寒冷。

original: Cotterell & Hathersage 'Beulah'
translation: 卡特洛尔 & 哈瑟萨奇“比乌拉”型火炮

original: "Why should Punishment Weave the Veil with Iron Wheels of War" A short-range, rapid-firing gun capable of quick turn arounds. Beloved by the short-tempered and the short-sighted.
translation: “天罚为何要织上战争铁轮的帷纱” 一种射程短，射速快的枪，能够快速回转。受到脾气暴躁和目光短浅之人的喜爱。

original: Cotterell & Hathersage 'Emanation'
translation: 卡特洛尔 & 哈瑟萨奇“显灵”型火炮

original: "For ever there is a Judgment." Effectively a locomotive-mounted blunderbuss, the Emanation fires a mauling spread of munitions and is best employed at close range. It has been described as "A proper b____r to reload."
translation: “对司命武器。” 实际上是一台安装在机车上的大口径短枪，能一次性发射大量弹药，最适合近距离使用。人们说它“重新装填时折磨至极”。

original: Cotterell & Hathersage 'Golgonooza'
translation: 卡特洛尔 & 哈瑟萨奇“哥贡欧扎”型火炮

original: "What immortal hand or eye, dare frame thy fearful symmetry?" The pride and terror of Cotterell & Hathersage, colloquially known as 'the Finisher'. Its recoil is never forgotten by those who fire her. The opinion of those fired upon is best sourced through a good medium. This must be mounted in a large weapon slot.
translation: “是怎样的神手或天眼，造出了你这样的威武堂堂？” 卡特洛尔 & 哈瑟萨奇的骄傲和恐怖之作，俗称“终结者”。开火的人将永远忘不掉它的后坐力。如果要见一位被这东西打中的人，你得到一位能干的灵媒那里去找。它必须安装在大型武器槽中。

original: Cotterell & Hathersage 'Jerusalem'
translation: 卡特洛尔 & 哈瑟萨奇“耶路撒冷”型火炮

original: "Bring me my spear: O clouds unfold!" A no-nonsense, common-or-garden armament for the skyfarer on a budget.
translation: “予我长矛——阴云退散！” 为预算有限的行天客提供的，实用而寻常的武器。

original: Cotterell & Hathersage 'Vala'
translation: 卡特洛尔 & 哈瑟萨奇“瓦拉”型火炮

original: "At thy word & at thy look death enrobes me about." A rapid fire cannon that manages both heat and wanton devastation with admirable alacrity.
translation: “因你的话语，因你的目光，死亡笼罩了我。” 一门快速射击的大炮，能够以令人钦佩的敏捷性控制热量，肆意破坏。

original: Counsellor's Daughter
translation: 顾问的女儿

original: With your assistance, she escaped Perdurance. She must be taken to her mother at the Serene Mausoleum.
translation: 在你的帮助下，她逃出了琥珀宫。她必须被带往圣宁墓见她母亲。

original: Cramped Quarters
translation: 拥挤的列车员室

original: Additional crew quarters, squeezed in wherever you can find the space. Best recruit only the most flexible, or at least uncomplaining, crewmembers for a while.
translation: 额外的列车员宿舍，挤在你能找到的任何地方。最好只招募最灵活的，或者至少在一段时间内不抱怨的列车员。

original: Crate of Nostalgic Crockery
translation: 一箱引人怀旧的瓷器

original: Fine London china; porcelain plates bearing the Empress' face; cups and saucers, traced with roses.
translation: 精美的伦敦瓷器；印有皇后面容的瓷盘；描有玫瑰花纹的杯碟。

original: Crockery can be reliably purchased at Brabazon and the Floating Parliament, or sometimes retrieved from flotsam and jetsam.
translation: 瓷器总是可以在布拉巴宗和浮空议会买到，有时也可以从漂零杂物中找到。

original: Crew
translation: 列车员

original: How many do you have aboard?
translation: 你的车上有多少人?

original:
{"Bacchae":{"1":"Here in the heavens there is no defence from the maddening light of the stars. Your crew – on edge, weary, already haunted by their long journeys in the sky – are susceptible. One succumbs, and the madness leaps to another and another as quick as fire. Within a day, they rave with delusions and obsessions. Your engine is on the brink of disaster.","0":"Here in the heavens there is no defence from the maddening light of the stars. Your crew, if you had one, would no doubt have cracked by now: made vulnerable by the horrors you have witnessed, the dangers you have escaped, the glorious, awful secrets you have learned.

But you have no crew. There is only you, and you are fine. Abosolutely fine. How could you not be? You are the lonely regent of this patch of the sky. The captain's chair is your throne. Your will is law. Is this how God felt, when the world was young?"},"Mutiny":{"0":"Is nothing loyal? Even your engine rebels! And you are alone now. There are no engineers to repair the draughty punctures in the hull, or the persistent rattle in that cluster of pipes beneath the boiler. When you fix one thing, another breaks. 

Depressingly, it is the rattle in the pipes which kills you.","1":"A gunshot thunders in the close confines of your engine. Boots clatter in the corridors. A mutiny has broken out among your crew!

[There are no good options here. Each risks death.]"},"Euripides":{"0":"Here in the heavens there is no defence from the maddening light of the stars. Your crew, if you had one, would no doubt have cracked by now: made vulnerable by the horrors you have witnessed, the dangers you have escaped, the glorious, awful secrets you have learned.

But you have no crew. There is only you, and you are fine. Abosolutely fine. How could you not be? You are the lonely regent of this patch of the sky. The captain's chair is your throne. Your will is law. Is this how God felt, when the world was young?","1":"Here in the heavens there is no defence from the maddening light of the stars. You had assumed the shades in your crew were not susceptible; but they have been behaving strangely. 

First, silent processions through the hallways. Then lighting candles outside your room while your slept. They showed one of the crew their faces and made her wear a mask. Now she is leading them to your door. They have a rope, a knife of stone, and a mask, just for you. They want you to come with them."},"EmptyHouse":{"1":"Wordlessly, your crew tether your engine. Ignoring your orders, some of them gather their belongings and prepare to disembark. "This is our stop," one of them says.","0":"You've been here before, you think. In dreams, perhaps, or in the span of time before you were born. It has waited for you to return. "}}
translation:
{"Bacchae":{"1":"在这天穹之中，无处可避星辰的蛊惑之光。你的列车员——神经紧绷、疲惫不堪、早已被漫长星途折磨得形销骨立——正被疯狂侵蚀。一人沦陷，癫狂便如野火般蔓延。不出昼夜，他们已沉溺于妄想与执念。列车正濒临崩毁。","0":"在这天穹之中，无处可避星辰的蛊惑之光。倘若你尚有船员，此刻必定早已崩溃：那些你见证的可怖、逃离的险境、知晓的辉煌而骇人的秘密，都将成为他们的致命弱点。

但你孑然一身。唯你独存，且安然无恙。绝对正常。岂能有异？你是这片天穹的孤君。舰长席即王座，你意即律法。创世之初的上帝，是否也曾这般独坐？"},"Mutiny":{"0":"万物皆可叛！连你的引擎都揭竿而起！此刻你孤立无援。没有技师修补车体漏风的破洞，也无人处理锅炉下方管道群恼人的异响。刚修复一处，另一处便告急。

讽刺的是，杀死你的偏偏是管道的异响。","1":"机车的密闭空间爆发出枪鸣。军靴踏响走廊。你的列车员已掀起叛乱！

【此处并无良策，每个选择都通向死亡】"},"Euripides":{"0":"在这天穹之中，无处可避星辰的蛊惑之光。倘若你尚有列车员，此刻必定早已崩溃：那些你见证的可怖、逃离的险境、知晓的辉煌而骇人的秘密，都将成为他们的致命弱点。

但你孑然一身。唯你独存，且安然无恙。绝对正常。岂能有异？你是这片天穹的孤君。舰长席即王座，你意即律法。创世之初的上帝，是否也曾这般独坐？","1":"在这天穹之中，无处可避星辰的蛊惑之光。你原以为遗魂列车员不受侵蚀，但他们举止日渐诡异。

先是深夜在廊道无声列队巡行，继而在你沉睡时于舱门外点燃蜡烛。他们向某个列车员展露真容，强迫她戴上面具。此刻她正率众逼近你的舱门。他们带着绳索、石制匕首与专为你准备的面具，要你随行。"},"EmptyHouse":{"1":"列车员们沉默着系稳列车。有人无视指令，收拾行装准备离去。"我们在此下船。"\其中一人说道。","0":"此地似曾相识，你想。或许在梦境里，抑或诞生之前的时空罅隙中。它始终静候你的归来。"}}

original: Crew at the Relay
translation: 在中继站的列车员

original: You have left a number of your crew at Duskings Deep. You may collect them later.
translation: 你在暮渊留下了不少列车员。你可以稍后去召集他们。

original: {"1":"You have left some of your crew at the relay.","0":"You have reclaimed your crew."}
translation: {"1":"你在中继站留下了一些列车员。","0":"你已经领回了你的列车员。"}

original: Crew Embarked on an Expedition
translation: 踏上探险之旅的列车员

original: They will brave Traitor's Wood.
translation: 他们将在叛徒之林中冒险。

original: {"1":"These crew are ready to explore.","0":"You've got your crew back."}
translation: {"1":"这些列车员已经准备好进行探险。","0":"你的列车员回来了。"}

original: {"root":{"0":"[You must first decide how many crew you wish to take with you on your expedition. The more you take, the likelier your success, but at a risk of losing them all. Then, choose your destination.]","1":"[You must decide what your expedition's destination is. Expeditions for Otherworldly Artefacts are easier than for Bronzewood. Occasionally, a quest will require you to choose a unique destination.]"},"root2":{"1":"If you leave while you have crew embarked on an expedition, they will not be available until you complete that expedition.","0":" "}}
translation: {"root":{"0":"[需先选定随行列车员人数。随行人数越多，成功率越高，但全员覆没的风险也越大。随后择定探险目的地。]","1":"[需确定本次探险的目标地点。异界遗物勘探难度低于青铜木勘探。特殊任务偶会要求指定独特目的地。]"},"root2":{"1":"若在列车员执行探险期间启程离站，该批人员将无法调用直至任务完成","0":" "}}

original: CrewTimer
translation: 列车员计时器

original: CrewTithe
translation: 列车员什一税

original: Crimson Promise
translation: 绯红承诺

original: What is a life worth? This. (Acquire these from the Heart-Catchers, or occasionally from Blind Hermits.)
translation: 何物值得为之付出生命？此物。（从捕心花，或者偶尔从盲人隐士那里可以获得它。）

original: Critical Damage
translation: 关键的损伤

original: Your locomotive has is suffering complications due to the recent damage it sustained.
translation: 由于其最近遭到的伤害，机车产生了些许问题。

original: {"Repair":{"1":"(This will also repair the Critical Damage you have suffered.)","0":""}}
translation: {"Repair":{"1":"（这也将修复你所遭受的严重损害。）","0":""}}

original: Crossroads Timer
translation: 十字路口计时器

original: A debt will become due.
translation: 一笔债务将要到期。

original: Crown & Misery Pneumatic Mining Array
translation: 皇冠与苦难公司气动采矿阵列

original: Good, solid craftsmanship. You don't need elegance when you're boring through rock.
translation: 扎实的工艺。当你在岩石中钻孔时，你不需要优雅。

original: Crowned in Roses
translation: 佩上玫瑰冠

original: You have been fully initiated into the mysteries of Caduceus
translation: 你已足够了解商神宫的奥秘。

original: {"1":"The Thorn-Maiden has revealed to you the greatest Mystery of Caduceus."}
translation: {"1":"荆棘处女向你揭示了商神宫的最大奥秘。"}

original: Cryptic Benefactor
translation: 隐秘的人脉

original: A nod. A wink. They will be there when you need them. (Acquire these at the Ministry of Public Decency or the Toll-Tower.)
translation: 一个点头。一个眨眼。当你需要他们的时候，他们就会出现。（在公德部或渡灵塔获取。）

original: Cult Leaflets
translation: 邪教传单

original: The Parson at Worlebury-juxta-Mare is recruiting.
translation: 滨海沃伯瑞正在招募牧师。

original: {"1":"The Parson handed you a bundle of leaflets.","0":"You have disposed of the leaflets as requested."}
translation: {"1":"牧师递给你一捆传单。","0":"你已按要求处理了传单。"}

original: Curator Egg Timer
translation: 收藏家蛋的时计

original: Curator Mechanical Thing
translation: 机械事物收藏家

original: Curator's Egg
translation: 收藏家的蛋

original:
Beige and papery like a wasp nest, with the size and weight of an over-indulged lapdog. Is it your imagination, or does it feel as though there is warmth coming from it?

[Eggs can be sold at St Dominic's Station in London, Wolvesey Station in New Winchester and King's Idyll in Pan.]
translation:
米黄色，纸质外壳，像个大黄蜂窝，大小和重量活像只养尊处优的哈巴狗。是错觉吗？总觉得它透着股温热？

[蛋可在以下站点出售：伦敦圣多米尼克站、新温彻斯特伍夫塞站、潘城国王乐园站。]

original: Curdled
translation: 凝结

original: "Overly willing to please, envious, obsequious... are those chunks? ...in the soul." The Presiding Deviless, the Carillon Compendium.
translation: “沉溺于取悦、嫉妒、谄媚……灵魂中似有结块？”——女魔鬼主管，《钟琴区汇编》。

original: {"0":"The devils of Carillon claim to be experts in the assessment and improvement of the soul. They would describe yours as tantalisingly opaque, and rich with personality.","1":"The devils of Carillon claim to be experts in the assessment and improvement of the soul. They would describe yours as sickly, cloying and unappetisingly crawling. "}
translation: {"0":"钟琴区的魔鬼们自称是评估和改善灵魂的专家。他们认为你的灵魂浑浊诱人，且富有个性。","1":"钟琴区的魔鬼们自称是评估和改善灵魂的专家。他们认为你的灵魂病态，甜腻，令人作呕。"}

original: Current Locomotive
translation: 当前机车头

original: Currently Queueing
translation: 目前的队列

original: Worlebury-juxta-Mare is popular. You have to wait to get in.
translation: 滨海沃伯瑞热闹非凡。你必须等待才能进入。

original: {"3":"You are some way back in the queue. ","4":"You are at the back of the queue. ","2":"The bulk of the queue trails behind you. An end to your wait is in sight.","1":"You are nearly at the front of the queue.","0":"You are taken to the Couturier."}
translation: {"3":"你在队列的后方位置。","4":"你在队列的末尾。 ","2":"队列里大多数人都排在你后面。等待马上就要结束了。","1":"你几乎来到了队列的最前面。","0":"你被带到了服装设计师那里。"}

original: Currently Uprising
translation: 正在起义

original: When there's nothing to lose, there's nothing to lose.
translation: 当你一无所有的时候，你就不会惧怕失去任何东西。

original: Customs: London Cooldown
translation: 海关：伦敦冷却

original: You won't be checked for a while.
translation: 你这段时间里不会被检查

original: Cyclopean Owl
translation: 独眼鸮

original: It hoots scornfully at your suggestions. It will, eventually, do as you ask – but only because you clearly can't manage on your own.
translation: 虽对你的建议嗤之以鼻，它最终还是会听命于你——并非出于顺从，只因你显然应付不了侦查工作。

original: Danger to the New Street Line
translation: 新巷线的威胁

original: Your campaign is drawing attention.
translation: 你的活动引起了别人的注意。

original: {"1":"The New Street Line's Heat is now 1. Don't let it reach 10!","2":"The New Street Line's Heat is now 2. Don't let it reach 10!","3":"The New Street Line's Heat is now 3. Don't let it reach 10!","4":"The New Street Line's Heat is now 4. Don't let it reach 10!","5":"The New Street Line's Heat is now 5. Don't let it reach 10!","6":"The New Street Line's Heat is now 6. Don't let it reach 10!","7":"The New Street Line's Heat is now 7. Don't let it reach 10!","8":"The New Street Line's Heat is now 8. Don't let it reach 10!","9":"The New Street Line's Heat is now 9. Don't let it reach 10!","10":"The New Street Line's Heat is now 10..."}
translation: {"1":"新巷线的风紧现在是1。不要让它达到10！","2":"新巷线的风紧现在是2。不要让它达到10！","3":"新巷线的风紧现在是3。不要让它达到10！","4":"新巷线的风紧现在是4。不要让它达到10！","5":"新巷线的风紧现在是5。不要让它达到10！","6":"新巷线的风紧现在是6。不要让它达到10！","7":"新巷线的风紧现在是7。不要让它达到10！","8":"新巷线的风紧现在是8。不要让它达到10！","9":"新巷线的风紧现在是9。不要让它达到10！","10":"新巷线的风紧现在是10……"}

original: {"StationmasterStatus":{"0":"\"All's well at the moment, Captain.\"","1":"\"Nothing much to report, sir or ma'am. Ready for action when you are.\"","5":"\"Heard rumours they're increasing their sweeps of the docks, Captain. Something to do with us, I'll bet!\"","7":"\"Not to worry you, Captain, but I reckon we're making a bit too much noise. No big problem yet, but... just keeping you informed.\"","8":"\"Just a warning, Captain. Lots of peelers down below. Watch yourself when you're out and about.\"","10":"\"Captain, you'd best not be hanging around here. Wouldn't want you caught by the peelers. Don't worry about me. Don't let it reach 10!","5":"Heat is Rising. Currently 5. Don't let it reach 10!","6":"Heat is Rising. Currently 6. Don't let it reach 10!","7":"Heat is Rising. Currently 7. The Ministry is on its way!","0":"Heat is 0. Don't let it reach 10!"}}
translation: {"StationmasterStatus":{"0":"\"目前一切正常，车长。\"","1":"\"没什么特别要汇报的，先生或女士。您下令，我就采取行动。\"","5":"\"听说他们正在加紧巡查码头，车长。我敢打赌，这事儿跟咱们有关！\"","7":"\"不想吓您，车长，但我觉得咱们动静有点太大了。现在还不算大问题，但……只是提醒您一声。\"","8":"\"提醒您一句，车长。下面有很多警察。您在外面活动时要小心。\"","10":"\"车长，您最好别在这附近逗留。我可不想让你被警察逮住。别担心我。总得有人去打这场正义之战。\"","9":"他看起来有些担忧。\"车长，咱们这叫什么来着……叫走了狗屎运。再搞下去，部里的人就要来喝茶了。\"","3":"\"听说我们开始引起注意了，车长。这难道不是好事吗？说明咱们的行动起效果了……\""},"HeatLevel":{"1":"风紧上升中。目前为1。千万别让它涨到10！","2":"风紧上升中。目前为2。千万别让它涨到10！","4":"风紧上升中。目前为4。千万别让它涨到10！","3":"风紧上升中。目前为3。千万别让它涨到10！","5":"风紧上升中。目前为5。千万别让它涨到10！","6":"风紧上升中。目前为6。千万别让它涨到10！","7":"风紧上升中。目前为7。千万别让它涨到10！","8":"风紧上升中。目前为8。千万别让它涨到10！","9":"风紧上升中。目前为9。千万别让它涨到10！","10":"风紧上升中。目前为10。公德部的人要来了！","0":"风紧为0。千万别让它涨到10！"}}

original: Date
translation: 日期

original: Current date in game
translation: 游戏中的当前日期

original: {"1":"It is not the date that it was."}
translation: {"1":"这不是原来的那一天。"}

original: Days in Lustrum
translation: 在伍载镇的日子

original: Every day, more prospectors arrive in search of striking it rich
translation: 每天都有更多的探矿者来到这里，寻找发财的机会

original: {"0":"Time passes in Lustrum."}
translation: {"0":"时间在伍载镇流逝。"}

original: Days on Port Prosper
translation: 在兴荣港的日子

original: There's not always much going on in the little town.
translation: 小镇上并不总是有很多事情发生。

original: Days on the Avid Horizon
translation: 在渴求之地平线的日子

original: Stifled hours pass by.
translation: 窒息的时间流逝着。

original: Dealing with an Ironical Reformist
translation: 与尖酸刻薄的改革家打交道

original: She is causing problems for the Windward Company on New Winchester.
translation: 她正在给新温彻斯特的迎风公司制造麻烦。

original: {"1":"The Parsimonious Chairman has a task for you.","5":"You are to travel to New Winchester and deliver a vial of honey to the Round Table.","10":"You have rejected the Parsimonious Chairman's proposal.","15":"You were unable to reach the Ironical Reformist.","20":"You successfully sabotaged the Ironical Reformist's rally.","25":"You successfully sabotaged the Parsimonious Chairman's scheme.","30":"The Parsimonious Chairman was pleased with your work.","35":"The Parsimonious Chairman was displeased with your work."}
translation: {"1":"吝啬鬼主席有事找你。","5":"你要前往新温彻斯特，给圆桌会议送瓶蜂蜜。","10":"你拒绝了吝啬鬼主席的提议。","15":"没联系上尖酸刻薄的改革家。","20":"你成功搅黄了改革家的集会。","25":"你把吝啬鬼主席的计划搞砸了。","30":"吝啬鬼主席对你的工作挺满意。","35":"吝啬鬼主席对你的工作很不满意。"}

original: Dealing with the Deathless
translation: 与不死者打交道

original: You have sufficiently impressed one of the Mausoleum's courtiers enough for them to solicit your services as a courier.
translation: 你已经给陵墓的一位朝臣留下了足够的印象，以至于那人请求您担任信使。

original: Death in a Jar
translation: 罐中的死亡

original: The Heart-Catchers of Pan have learned the art of imprisoning unwanted deaths, to be disposed of carefully.
translation: 潘城的捕心花们已经学会了囚禁不想要的死亡的艺术，并小心地处理它们。

original: {"1":"You have three deaths to dispose of.","2":"You have two more deaths to dispose of.","3":"You only have one more death to dispose of.","4":"You have disposed of all three deaths."}
translation: {"1":"你有3个死亡需要遗弃。","2":"你还有2个死亡需要遗弃。","3":"你只有1个死亡需要遗弃。","4":"你遗弃了全部3个死亡。"}

original: Death's Door: Indulgence Timer
translation: 死亡之门：放纵计时器

original: Death's Door: Testament Timer
translation: 死亡之门：遗嘱计时器

original: Debt
translation: 债务

original: You raided a cache in a signal box. Honour demands that you pay back what you took.
translation: 你搜刮了一个信号箱中的物品。出于荣誉，你必须归还你偷走的东西。

original: {"1":"You have accrued debt. Your crew may become anxious while it hangs over you.","0":"You have paid off your skyfarer's debt."}
translation: {"1":"你积累了债务。当它笼罩着你时，你的列车员可能会变得焦虑不安。","0":"你已经偿还了行天客的债务。"}

original: {"Debt":{"0":"","1":"Your crew didn't like you taking from the cache when you already owe a skyfarer's debt. They consider it unwise. It draws attention. There are some who won't work for one risks the wrath of the gods."},"DebtResult":{"0":""}}
translation: {"Debt":{"0":"","1":"在已经欠下行天客债务的情况下，你的列车员不喜欢你从箱子拿东西。他们认为这是不明智的。这么做会引起什么东西的注意。有人不愿意冒着众神的愤怒而为他人工作。"},"DebtResult":{"0":""}}

original: Debutante's Favour
translation: 闺秀的声望

original: Today, you are popular among the debutantes of the Half-Light Masque.
translation: 今天，你在明暗假面舞会的名媛中很受欢迎。

original: Deed: a Coterie
translation: 事迹：一个小圈子

original: You belong to a bohemian coterie.
translation: 你属于一个波西米亚派艺术家的小圈子。

original: You unlocked this by having Affiliation: Bohemia at 2 or more.
translation: 你拥有2点或以上的人脉：放荡艺术家，因此解锁了该选项。

original: Deed: a Disgraced Predecessor
translation: 事迹：耻辱的前辈

original: A prior captain in your lineage died in disgrace. The shadow they cast still falls on you.
translation: 在你的世系中，有一位前任车长在耻辱中死去。那人投下的阴影仍然笼罩在你身上。

original: You unlocked this by continuing a lineage after the death of a captain.
translation: 你解锁了该选项，因为延续了前任车长的世系继续游戏。

original: Deed: A Jar with your Death in it
translation: 事迹：一个装着你死亡的罐子

original: The Heart-Catchers of Pan have trapped one of your probable deaths.
translation: 潘城的捕心花困住了你的一个可能的死亡。

original: You unlocked this by trading your prophecied death to the Heart-Catchers.
translation: 你将你预言中的死亡交给捕心花，因此解锁了该选项。

original: {"10":"You have acquired a new facet: a Jar with your Death in it!"}
translation: {"10":"你获得了一个新刻面：一个装着你的死亡的罐子！"}

original: Deed: A Knight of the Brazen Brigade
translation: 事迹：黄铜大队的骑士

original: You rose through the ranks of the infernal Brigade, achieving the accolade and communion with Hell's Saints.
translation: 你在地狱大队的队伍中不断上升，获得了荣誉和与地狱圣徒的交谊。

original: You unlocked this by aligning yourself with the Brazen Brigade.
translation: 你与黄铜大队结盟，因此解锁了该选项。

original: Deed: a Narrow Escape
translation: 事迹：死里逃生

original: Your engine was nearly destroyed, but you lived to fight another day.
translation: 你的机车几乎被毁，但你置死地而后生。

original: You unlocked this when your hull fell to 10 or below, but you survived.
translation: 你在机车车体被减少到10以下却依然存活，因而解锁了此选项。

original: Deed: a Secret Symposium
translation: 事迹：一个秘密研讨会

original: You were part of a secret conclave of experts.
translation: 你是一个秘密的专家会议的一员。

original: You unlocked this by having Affiliation: Academe at 2 or more.
translation: 你拥有2点或以上的人脉：学术界，因此解锁了该选项。

original: Deed: a Thief-Oath
translation: 事迹：盗贼之誓

original: You have sworn a thief-oath with your criminal compatriots.
translation: 你和你的犯罪同伙们一起宣誓了盗贼誓言。

original: You unlocked this by having Affiliation: Villainy at 2 or more.
translation: 你拥有2点或以上的人脉：恶棍，因此解锁了该选项。

original: Deed: an Esteemed Predecessor
translation: 事迹：一位受人尊敬的前辈

original: A prior captain in your lineage is well-regarded.
translation: 在你的世系中，有一位受人尊敬的车长前辈。

original: You unlocked this by continuing a lineage after the death of a captain.
translation: 你解锁了该选项，因为延续了前任车长的世系继续游戏。

original: Deed: Far-Travelled
translation: 事迹：远游

original: You have journeyed to all the corners of the sky.
translation: 你已走遍了天空的各个角落。

original: You unlocked this by visiting all four regions.
translation: 你拜访过四个地区中的每一个，因此解锁了该选项。

original: Deed: Seasoned Smuggler
translation: 事迹：老练的走私者

original: You are the bane of the Revenue Men.
translation: 你是税务官的死敌。

original: You unlocked this by increasing your Reputation: Smugglers to 3 or more.
translation: 你已将你的声望：走私者提高到3点或以上，因此解锁了该选项。

original: Deed: the Call of the Sea
translation: 事迹：海洋的呼唤

original: You are marked by an old exchange between one that was human and one that was not.
translation: 被人类与非人类之间的古老交流所标记。

original: You unlocked this by aligning yourself with the cult at Worlebury-juxta-Mare.
translation: 你与滨海沃伯瑞的邪教结盟，因此解锁了该选项。

original: Deed: The Final Month
translation: 事迹：最后一月

original: You gave of yourself to assist the Liberation of the Night. December recognised your gesture.
translation: 你献出了自己，协助黑夜解放。十二月认可了你的姿态。

original: You unlocked this by aligning yourself with December.
translation: 你与十二月结盟，因此解锁了该选项。

original: Deed: the Keeper of the Clocks
translation: 事迹：守钟者

original: You are a proven agent of the Horological Office.
translation: 你是时计部的受证代理人。

original: You unlocked this by increasing your rank with the Royal Horological Office to 3 or more.
translation: 你将皇家时计部的等级提高到了3级或以上，因此解锁了该选项。

original: Deed: the Witness
translation: 事迹：见证者

original: You saw a sun turn to night.
translation: 你看到一个太阳变成了黑夜。

original: You unlocked this by aligning yourself with the Heart-Catchers.
translation: 你与捕心花结盟，因此解锁了该选项。

original: Deed: Your Club
translation: 事迹：你的俱乐部

original: The membership is exclusive.
translation: 会员资格是专属的。

original: You unlocked this by increasing your Affiliation: Establishment to 2 or more.
translation: 你拥有2点或以上的人脉：权贵，因此解锁了该选项。

original: Defeated the Prophet
translation: 击败先知

original: Deference to the Deformer
translation: 对易形者的顺从

original: The Glistening Deformer believes the prisoners of Piranesi can find freedom in abomination. He has no patience for those who fail to respect him or his mission.
translation: 油滑的易形者相信皮拉内西的囚犯可以在厌恶中寻求自由。他对那些不尊重他或他的使命的人没有耐心。

original: Defiant Devil
translation: 叛逆的魔鬼

original: He has considered returning to the service of the Judgements. He has decided against.
translation: 他曾考虑过重新归顺于司命，但最终决定放弃。

original: {"1":"The Defiant Devil is part of your crew."}
translation: {"1":"叛逆的魔鬼是你列车员的一员。"}

original: Delivered a Port Report
translation: 已提交车站报告

original: Tracks if you've delivered a port report - opens up VH/CH content if you have - and locks tutorial branches
translation: 追踪你是否提交了车站报告。如果你提交了，则打开常胜厅/公司大楼内容，并锁定教程分支

original: Delivering a Christmas Card
translation: 送出一张圣诞贺卡

original: You have been asked to act as a postman for the Calendar Council.
translation: 日历会要求你替其充当邮差。

original: {"0":"You have delivered all the Christmas Council's cards.","2":"You have delivered the first Christmas card.","1":"You have delivered the second Christmas card.","3":"You have been asked to deliver Christmas Cards: to Polmear and Plenty's and to London.","4":"You have delivered all the Christmas Council's cards."}

original: Delivering a Settler
translation: 运输移民

original: Where did they ask to go?
translation: 这人要去哪里？

original: {"1":"The settler wants to be taken to Port Avon.","2":"The settler wants to be taken to Titania.","3":"The settler wants to be taken to Traitor's Wood.","4":"The settler wants to be taken to Lustrum.","5":"The settler wants to be taken to Leadbeater & Stainrod Nature Reserve.","100":"You've delivered a settler. If you visit Queen's Cross in Port Prosper, you can pick up another, or inspire a new crop to travel.","200":"You're rid of your settler. translation: {"1":"移民想去埃文港。","2":"移民想去狄坦妮娅。","3":"移民想去叛徒之林。","4":"移民想去伍载镇。","5":"移民想去李德彼特&斯坦罗德自然保护区。","100":"移民已送达。你可以造访兴荣港的女王十字车站，将另一位移民接上车，或鼓励另一位当地人成为移民","200":"已摆脱移民。你可以造访兴荣港的女王十字车站，将另一位移民接上车，或鼓励另一位当地人成为移民"}

original: {"QuestStart":{"0":"QuestStart","2":"\"I simply must move to Titania! A giggling nudist capers after them.","3":"The forest is silent, save for the call of a single bird. One of your crew takes a deep lungful of the musky air. In the distance, you hear a flock take flight; a gunshot; a horn.","4":"Lustrum sings its own song. The mines ring, the caverns howl; the machines roar. \n","102":"A breeze wafts the sweet perfumes of wild flower in your direction. Lovers race by in various states of undress. In the distance, you hear a flock take flight; a gunshot; a horn.","1":"A colonist approaches the settler and offers them a limp, awkward handshake. \"I am the founder of our little welcoming committee,\" he says. \"And I should like to welcome you to Port Avon. May you find it a happy haven.\" ","101":"A colonist gives the settler a limp, awkward handshake. \"I am the founder of our little welcoming committee,\" he says. \"And I should like to welcome you to Port Avon. May you find it a happy haven.\" ","5":"The flora of the Leadbeater & Stainrod Nature Reserve loom taller than its high iron walls. The researchers on the walls do not notice you.","105":"The flora of the Leadbeater & Stainrod Nature Reserve loom taller than its high iron walls. The researchers on the walls do not notice you."},"Reminder":{"0":"Reminder","1":"You are delivering a settler to Port Avon","2":"You are delivering a settler to Titania","3":"You are delivering a settler to Traitor's Wood","4":"You are delivering a settler to Lustrum","5":"You are delivering a settler to Leadbeater & Stainrod Nature Reserve"}}
translation: {"QuestStart":{"0":"任务开始","2":"“我必须搬到狄坦妮娅！据我所知，那里简直美若仙境。”","101":"“朋友总从埃文港寄明信片给我，那地方实在太别致了！带我去吧。”","102":"“我必须搬到狄坦妮娅！据我所知，那里简直美若仙境。”","103":"“劳驾送我去叛徒之林，我想打点野味。”","1":"“朋友总从埃文港寄明信片，我从没见过这么有趣的地方！你必须带我去。”","3":"“劳驾送我去叛徒之林，我想打点野味。”","4":"“买单程票去伍载镇！老天作证，该去看看真正的边疆了！”","104":"“买单程票去伍载镇！老天作证，该去看看真正的边疆了！”","5":"“能送我去李德彼特&斯坦罗德自然保护区吗？我想看看荒野——当然要保持安全距离。”","105":"“能送我去李德彼特&斯坦罗德自然保护区吗？我想看看荒野——当然要保持安全距离。”"},"QuestEnd":{"0":"任务结束","2":"清风送来野花的甜香。情侣们衣不蔽体地追逐嬉戏，嬉笑的天体主义者紧随其后。","3":"森林寂静，唯闻孤鸟啼鸣。某位列车员深吸一口麝香空气。远处传来鸟群惊飞声、枪响与号角。","4":"伍载镇自有其交响曲：矿井叮当，洞窟呜咽，机械轰鸣。\n","102":"清风送来野花的甜香。情侣们衣不蔽体地追逐嬉戏，嬉笑的天体主义者紧随其后。","104":"伍载镇自有其交响曲：矿井叮当，洞窟呜咽，机械轰鸣。\n","103":"森林寂静，唯闻孤鸟啼鸣。某位船员深吸一口麝香空气。远处传来鸟群惊飞声、枪响与号角。","1":"殖民者僵硬地与移民握手：“我是欢迎委员会创始人，欢迎来到埃文港，愿此成为乐土。”","101":"殖民者与移民笨拙握手：“我是欢迎委员会创始人，欢迎来到埃文港，愿此成为乐土。”","5":"李德彼特&斯坦罗德的植物群高过铁墙。墙上的研究者们无人注意到你们。","105":"李德彼特&斯坦罗德的植物群高过铁墙。墙上的研究者们无人注意到你们。"},"Reminder":{"0":"任务提醒","1":"正在运送移民至埃文港","2":"正在运送移民至狄坦妮娅","3":"正在运送移民至叛徒之林","4":"正在运送移民至伍载镇","5":"正在运送移民至李德彼特&斯坦罗德自然保护区"}}

original: Delivering Anti-Cinder Propaganda
translation: 散发反对太阳灰的传单

original: Truth must out!
translation: 真相必须大白！

original: {"3":"You have delivered the propaganda as the Researcher requested. Return to him for more.","1":"You are delivering propaganda to New Winchester.","2":"You are delivering propaganda to Port Prosper."}

translation: 运送太阳灰

original: The newest pleasure, straight from the Reach. The Leadbeater & Stainrod Company assure its physical and mental benefits.
translation: 最新的乐趣，从外野直运而来。李德彼特&斯坦罗德公司保证其有益身心。

Delivering Sapling Knots
translation: 运送生苗树结

original: They aren't very useful, but people still buy these novel items.
translation: 它们并不十分有用，但人们还是会购买这些新奇的物品。

original: {"3":"You have delivered the Sapling Knots. Return to the Reserve for more.","2":"Deliver Sapling Knots to Port Prosper.","1":"Deliver Sapling Knots to New Winchester."}

original: Delivering the Sky-Maddened Captain
translation: 运送天狂车长

original: They've seen too much out here.
translation: 此人在这里见得太多了。

original: {"1":"You are escorting a Sky-Maddened Captain to Magdalene's.","2":"You have escorted a Sky-Maddened Captain to Magdalene's."}
translation: {"1":"你正在护送一名天狂车长到抹大拉之家。","2":"你已经将一名天狂车长送至抹大拉之家。"}

original: Delivering Verdant Encouragement
translation: 送出翠树催长剂

original: Anything planted in this will grow.
translation: 任何用过这东西的植物都会生长。

original: {"3":"You have delivered the Verdant Encouragement. Return to the Reserve for more.","1":"Deliver Verdant Encouragement to New Winchester.","2":"Deliver Verdant Encouragement to Port Prosper."}
translation: {"3":"你已交付了翠树催长剂。返回保护区获取更多。","1":"将翠树催长剂交付到新温彻斯特。","2":"将翠树催长剂结交付到兴荣港。"}

original: {"location":{"0":"location","1":"New Winchester","2":"Port Prosper"}}
translation: {"location":{"0":"地点","1":"新温彻斯特","2":"兴荣港"}}

original: Delving into the Dome
translation: 深入穹顶

original: {"dome_discovery":{"1":"You find your path blocked by a tangle of bleached-white foliage. The Shalimar garden exploded from its greenhouse long ago, feeding furiously on the Sun's light until it swelled to a jungle.","3":"Soon you stumble upon a gleaming forest of glass sculptures. As you get closer you realize they were once tourists, from back when the exhibition was still open to the public. What were they clustered around?","2":"A scream — one of your crew is staring in horror at her hand, which has suddenly shrivelled and sprouted liver spots. The light can do strange things to the flow of time, and you seem to have strayed into a bad patch.","4":"You come upon what looks like a glittering gold carousel, but instead of horses it features glass bottles as tall as you. They are each filled with an near-impenetrable liquid, and within, dark shapes writhe sluggishly."}}
translation: {"dome_discovery":{"1":"你发现前路被一团漂白的藤蔓阻挡。沙利马尔花园早已横生漫长，在温室外疯狂吞噬阳光，最终膨胀为一片丛林。","3":"不久你偶然发现一片闪亮的玻璃雕塑森林。靠近些后你才意识到，它们曾是游客，那时展览尚对公众开放。他们曾围聚于何物周围？","2":"一声尖叫——你的一名列车员惊恐地盯着自己的手。它忽然干瘪，布满老年斑。阳光会让时间之流扭曲，而你似乎误入了光照的恶劣地带。","4":"你来到一个仿佛金色旋转木马的东西前。但木马上不是马，而是一瓶瓶与你等高的玻璃瓶。每只瓶中都盛满近乎无法透光的液体，其内，有暗影在迟缓地蠕动。"}}

original: Dendrified Vagabond
translation: 木质化的流浪汉

original: His lower half is a tangle of roots; his arm a sagging branch. He is planted in his quarters, twisted and brittle and languishing.
translation: 他的下半身是一团纠葛的树根，手臂则是下垂的树枝。他被栽种在他的住所中，扭曲脆弱、日渐凋零。

original: {"1":"The Dendrified Vagabond has been dragged aboard your engine."}
translation: {"1":"木质化的流浪汉已经被拖上了你的机车。"}

original: DEPRECATED Delivered the Rose-Cheeked Cook
translation: 已弃用 交付玫瑰脸厨师

original: They're cooking away over in Pan.
translation: 他们在潘城做饭。

original: DEPRECATED Recruited the Rose-Cheeked Cook
translation: 已弃用 招募玫瑰脸厨师

original: Thankfully, they won't be cooking any of your meals.
translation: 值得庆幸的是，对方不会为你做任何饭菜。

original: {"1":"You have recruited the Rose-Cheeked Cook."}
translation: {"1":"你已经招募了玫瑰脸厨师。"}

original: DEPRECATED Rose-Cheeked Cook
translation: DEPRECATED Rose-Cheeked Cook

original: The things it can do with fish... whether you want it to or not.
translation: 它能对鱼做的事情......不管你是否愿意。

original: {"1":"You have recruited the Rose-Cheeked Cook.","0":"You have delivered the Rose-Cheeked Cook."}
translation: {"1":"你已经招募了玫瑰脸厨师。","0":"你把玫瑰脸厨师送走了。"}

original: Desperate Measures
translation: 绝望之举

original: More time! She must have more time!
translation: 更多时间！她必须获得更多时间！

original: {"1":"Deliver 3 Barrels of Unseasoned Hours to the Broken Steward on the Clockwork Sun.","2":"Deliver three more Barrels of Unseasoned Hours to the Broken Steward on the Clockwork Sun.","3":"Deliver three more Barrels of Unseasoned Hours to the Broken Steward on the Clockwork Sun.","4":"You have brought enough hours to the Steward."}
translation: {"1":"将3桶未加工的时间运送给位于发条太阳的心力交瘁的总管。","2":"再将3桶未加工的时间运送给位于发条太阳的心力交瘁的总管。","3":"再将3桶未加工的时间运送给位于发条太阳的心力交瘁的总管。","4":"你已经给总管运送了足够多的时间。"}

original: Desperation
translation: 绝望

original: Hunger gnaws at you.
translation: 饥饿啃食着你。

original: Developing Bloom Bower
translation: 正在开发花亭

original: A new home for the arts will soon be complete!
translation: 一个艺术的新家很快就要建成了！

original: {"BloomBowerDeveloperComplete":{"0":"BloomBowerDeveloperComplete","1":"You're also joined by the Celestial Stalwart who, by contrast, daubs his forehead with a handkerchief. The musicians inside the Empyreal Ballroom have finished tuning their strings. The Rhapsodic Mayor presents you the ceremonial scissors.","2":"You're also joined by the Nocturnal Provocateur, who waves to the crowd. The troupe at the Saturnine Theatre wait inside for the curtain to rise. The Rhapsodic Mayor presents you the ceremonial scissors.","3":"You're also joined by the Sovereign Misanthrope, whose smile is so forced it's practically a grimace. He didn't appreciate sharing his British sensibilities with an \"inferior\" aesthetic, but was somewhat mollified by the amount of good English history contained in the library's acquisitions. The Rhapsodic Mayor presents you the ceremonial scissors."},"BloomBowerConstruction":{"0":"BloomBowerConstruction","1":"Work is underway on the Empyreal Ballroom. The Titanians shall soon be dancing under the stars.","2":"Work is underway on the Saturnine Theatre. Titania shall soon have a home fit for Tragedy.","3":"Work is underway on the Library of Yore. The historians' art will find no finer home than Titania."}}
translation: {"BloomBowerDeveloperComplete":{"0":"BloomBowerDeveloperComplete","1":"天体派忠实成员也加入了你们的行列。他用手帕拭去额上的汗水，与周遭形成了鲜明的对比。九天舞厅内的乐师们已调好琴弦，静候开奏。热情洋溢的市长将一把礼仪剪刀递到你手中。","2":"夜行派挑衅者也前来加入，并向人群挥手致意。土星剧院中的剧团成员正等待帷幕升起。热情洋溢的市长将一把礼仪剪刀递到你手中。","3":"皇政派厌世者也加入了你们，但他的微笑勉强得几乎像是在咧嘴。他对将英国情怀与\"劣等\"美学混搭颇有微词，不过图书馆所收录的大量英国史料稍微安抚了他。热情洋溢的市长将一把礼仪剪刀递到你手中。"},"BloomBowerConstruction":{"0":"BloomBowerConstruction","1":"九天舞厅的建设正在进行中。不久之后，狄坦妮娅人将在星光之下起舞。","2":"农神剧场的建设正在进行中。狄坦妮娅将迎来一个悲剧之家的落成。","3":"昔日图书馆的建设正在进行中。历史学家的技艺将在狄坦妮娅找到最合适的归宿。"}}

original: Developing Petal Fall
translation: 正在开发花瓣谷

original: Titania's greatest architectural accomplishment is underway!
translation: 狄坦妮娅最伟大的建筑正在建造中！

original: {"PetalEndDeveloperComplete":{"0":"PetalEndDeveloperComplete","1":"The Celestial Stalwart stands by your side. He stares away into the far reaches of the High Wilderness; off into the stars. The Rhapsodic Mayor presents you the ceremonial scissors.","2":"Next to you, the Nocturnal Provocateur tests out his opera glasses by scanning the crowd and admiring the finer details of a number of Titania's more attractive citizens. The Rhapsodic Mayor presents you the ceremonial scissors.","3":"But on the eve of his greatest triumph, the Sovereign Misanthrope is nowhere to be seen. Rumour has it he hasn't left his room since he saw the Cathedral's decorations. The Rhapsodic Mayor presents you the ceremonial scissors.","4":"The Apollo Fortress stands against the horizon, defiant."},"PetalFallConstruction":{"0":"PetalFallConstruction","1":"Work is underway on the Observatory. The astronomical arts shall be practised here.","2":"Work is underway on the Light Opera House. Nowhere else in the Wilderness will you find comedy so incisive or penetrating.","3":"Work is underway on the Imperial Cathedral. The hymns they shall sing will ignite future choirs.","4":"Work is underway on the Apollo Fortress. May it offer the Titanians some protection."}}
translation: {"PetalEndDeveloperComplete":{"0":"PetalEndDeveloperComplete","1":"天体派忠实成员立于你身侧。他凝望着天野的彼端——那遥不可及的星辰之域。热情洋溢的市长将一把礼仪剪刀递到你手中。","2":"夜行派挑衅者站在你旁边，正用他的歌剧望远镜扫视人群，细细欣赏狄坦妮娅几位风姿绰约的市民。热情洋溢的市长将一把礼仪剪刀递到你手中。","3":"就在他即将迎来至高荣耀的前夜，皇政派厌世者却踪影全无。据说自从他看到大教堂的装饰后，便再未踏出房门。热情洋溢的市长将一把礼仪剪刀递到你手中。","4":"阿波罗要塞伫立天际，满怀傲然之意。"},"PetalFallConstruction":{"0":"PetalFallConstruction","1":"天文台的建设正在进行中。天体的艺术将在此重绽光辉。","2":"轻歌剧院的建设正在进行中。在这片天野中，再无其他地方能呈现如此犀利深刻的喜剧。","3":"帝国大教堂的建设正在进行中。他们将吟唱的圣歌，必将点燃未来的赞颂之声。","4":"阿波罗要塞的建设正在进行中。愿它能为狄坦妮娅人带来些许庇护。"}}

original: Developing Posy Park
translation: 正在开发锦簇公园

original: A new addition is coming to the pleasure district!
translation: 游乐区即将迎来新的成员！

original: {"PosyParkDeveloperComplete":{"0":"PosyParkDeveloperComplete","1":"Also on the stage is the Celestial Stalwart, who hums an ancient tune to himself. It has apparently been stuck in his head, after weeks of working with the rhapsode who now waits inside. The Rhapsodic Mayor presents you the ceremonial scissors.","2":"Also on stage is the Nocturnal Provocateur. He bites down on his lip so hard, you think he may draw blood. The crowd is giddy too, and ready to enter the Lusty Palace he has designed. The Rhapsodic Mayor presents you the ceremonial scissors.","4":"The Academy looms, silent as a tomb. Soon it shall resound with shouts and gunfire.","3":"Also on stage is the Sovereign Misanthrope. He cannot bring himself to smile, however; as long as he doesn't look too closely at the pub's signboard again, all should go well. The Rhapsodic Mayor presents you the ceremonial scissors."},"PosyParkConstruction":{"0":"PosyParkConstruction","1":"Work is underway on the Astral Amphitheatre. Epic poetry will no longer be confined to pages alone; they shall be spoken again.","2":"Work is underway on the Lustful Palace. Love poems will blossom in its courtyards.","3":"Work is underway on the Queen's Head. The Titanians will have a home for their songs at last.","4":"Work is underway on the Academy for the Bloody Arts. It is not what they want; but it might be what they need."}}
translation: {"PosyParkDeveloperComplete":{"0":"PosyParkDeveloperComplete","1":"一同登上舞台的还有天体派忠实成员，他正轻声哼唱着一首古老的曲调。据说，自从与那位如今在剧场中等待的吟游诗人一同工作数周以来，这首旋律在他脑中盘桓已久。热情洋溢的市长将一把礼仪剪刀递到你手中。","2":"一同登台的还有夜行派挑衅者。他紧咬下唇，几乎要咬出血来。台下人群同样兴奋不已，迫不及待想踏入他所设计的情欲宫殿。热情洋溢的市长将一把礼仪剪刀递到你手中。","4":"学院高耸天际，寂静得如同坟墓。不久之后，这里将响彻呼喊与枪火之声。","3":"一同登台的还有皇政派厌世者。然而他依旧无法挤出一丝笑容——只要不再细看酒馆的招牌，一切就都还好。热情洋溢的市长将一把礼仪剪刀递到你手中。"},"PosyParkConstruction":{"0":"PosyParkConstruction","1":"星空露天剧场的建设正在进行中。史诗将不再只被书写，它们将再次被高声吟诵。","2":"情欲宫殿的建设正在进行中。爱之诗将在其庭院中绽放。","3":"女王之首酒馆的建设正在进行中。狄坦妮娅人终于将有一个属于他们歌声的栖所。","4":"血腥艺术学院的建设正在进行中。这或许不是他们想要的，但也许是他们所需要的。"}}

original: Devil Recruited
translation: 招募魔鬼

original: Devil's Ambition
translation: 魔鬼的野心

original: How willing is the Repentant Devil to submit to the will of the Judgments, if it lets him pursue his talents?
translation: 若是能发挥自己的天资，悔过的魔鬼有多愿意服从司命的意志？

original: {"0":"The Repentant Devil has become more ambitious."}
translation: {"0":"悔过的魔鬼越发雄心勃勃。"}

original: Devil's Rebellion

translation: {"0":"悔过的魔鬼变得对司命们更加愤怒。"}

translation: 悔改的魔鬼的避世意愿有多强烈？

original: {"0":"The Repentant Devil has become more inclined to withdraw from the world."}
translation: {"0":"悔过的魔鬼变得更加避世。"}

translation: 它的态度很明确：就它？出去侦查？在这种天气下工作？真谢谢你了，但是做不到。

original: Dilly
translation: 迪莉

original: She has too many knees and not enough respect for other people's fingers, but some might find her lovable.
translation: 她关节太多，对别人的手指不够尊重，但有的人也许会发现她的可爱之处。

original: {"1":"You have Dilly!","0":"Dilly is no more."}
Dining at the Royal Society
translation: 在皇家学会就餐

original: {"Dinner":{"1":"The first course ends with a great smacking of lips, and a general feeling of good will towards the chef.","2":"The second course ends with the Lecturer in Imperial Affairs telling a rather ribald joke, and a hearty toast to the continued health of all present.","3":"The third course comes to a close with a great groaning, and heartfelt but false protestations that one couldn't possibly manage cheese and biscuits after all this.","0":"A sign on the door in neat copperplate reads \"Nell's Tower closed for the Thirteenth Annual Airy Dinner. Leave Urgent Business at Doorstep.\"\n\nThere is a polite cough at your shoulder. Turning, you see a tall man with a beard like a nest of vipers. The Supercilious Bursar introduces himself. \"I came to round up stragglers. But, as a captain, you are of rank sufficient to attend the dinner, if you wish to attend.\""}}
translation: {"Dinner":{"1":"第一道菜在一片咂嘴声中结束，人们普遍对厨师产生了好感。","2":"第二道菜在帝国事务讲师讲了一个相当好笑的笑话，并为在场所有人的健康干杯后结束。","3":"第三道菜在大家的呻吟声中结束，人们发自内心但与事实不符地抗议说，在吃完这些之后，他们不可能再吃得下奶酪和饼干了。","0":"门上有一个精致的铜板标牌，上面写着：\"内尔塔因举办第十三届年度空中晚宴而关闭。宴会时不处理要事。\"\n\n你的肩膀处传来一声礼貌的咳嗽。转过身，你看到一个高大的男人，他的胡须像一窝毒蛇。傲慢的书记员介绍了自己。\"本人负责驱离闲杂人等。但作为一名车长，您的级别足以参加晚宴，如果您愿意的话。\""}}

original: Dining with the Dead
translation: 与死者共餐

original: You have been known to partake of the Petrichor, the forbidden food of the dead.
translation: 你已经被知晓食用了石之灵液，死者的禁忌食物。

original: {"Relay":{"1":"Now, they flock silently around you, tongues lolling from their slanting death-masks. They part, forming a path to the inner room. The Inhabitor wants to see you.","0":"They close in, their faces hidden behind angular, porcelain death-masks. But after a cursory sniff, they return to their reverie. It seems, for the moment, that you are free to return to the Reach."},"Debt":{"1":" ","0":"\"Your debt is paid,\" the Inhabitor's voice-jar intones. \"If you wish, you may return to your chariot, and the way will open.\""},"Dinner":{"1":"The handful of shades on your crew cluster together at your end of the table, pulling their masks fractionally forwards to admit their forks. You are careful not to catch a glimpse of what lies beneath. Your living crew sit at the other end of the table, talking quietly among themselves.","2":"Fully half your crew are shades, now. They insinuate themselves between the living crew, so the seating arrangement is one living, one dead, one living, one dead – all around the table. Conversation is impossible. The meal is silent and solemn.","3":"There are few living souls among your crew now. They find places at the table, squeezed in between the silent shades. The dead shuffle solemnly up to make room. You begin to eat, lowering your gaze from the ring of cold, porcelain masks before you."},"Galley":{"1":"Among them stand the silent, masked spirits of the dead you recruited to help staff your locomotive. ","2":"About half of them are now silent, masked spirits of the dead who you recruited to help staff your locomotive. ","3":"Most of them are now silent, masked spirits of the dead who you recruited to help staff your locomotive."}}
translation: {"Relay":{"1":"现在，它们默默地聚集在你四周，舌头从歪斜的死亡面具下耷拉出来。它们为你让出通向内室的道路。门槛住民想见你。","0":"它们靠近你，面孔隐藏在棱角分明的瓷制死亡面具后。但在粗略地嗅闻一番后，它们又回到了各自的冥想中。看来，现在你可以返回外野了。"},"Debt":{"1":" ","0":"\"汝债已偿，\"门槛住民的声音罐低声说道，\"若汝有意，可归战车。道途将为汝而启。\""},"Dinner":{"1":"你列车员中为数不多的几位遗魂聚在餐桌一端，稍稍将面具向前拉开，以便将叉子送入口中。你小心不去窥视面具下隐藏的东西。活着的列车员们坐在桌子的另一端，低声交谈。","2":"如今你的一半列车员都是遗魂。他们穿插在活人之间落座，按照一死一生的席位顺序围绕整个餐桌。没有人交谈，饭局静默肃穆。","3":"如今你的列车员中活人已寥寥无几。用餐时，他们被寂静的遗魂围绕。死者庄重地挪动身躯，为他们让出空间。你开始进餐，垂下视线，不去直视那一圈冰冷的瓷制面具。"},"Galley":{"1":"在他们之中站着你招募来协助列车运作的死者——那些带着面具的沉默鬼魂。","2":"如今你的一半列车员已是你招募来协助列车运作的死者——那些带着面具的沉默鬼魂。","3":"如今你的列车员大多都是你招募来协助列车运作的死者——那些带着面具的沉默鬼魂。"}}

translation: 发现：厄琉忒里亚的港口

translation: 发现：外野的港口

translation: 令人不安的荒冢

translation: 你在干些不明智的事情。

translation: DO NOT USE 补给消耗
